nodes.text: Droids 3 is the third issue of the Legends comic book miniseries Star Wars: Droids. It was written by Dan Thorsland, illustrated by Ian Gibson, and first published by Dark Horse Comics on June 21, 1994. It introduces the assassin droid C-3PX, who appeared in later Star Wars works.
In a deadly case of mistaken identity, See-Threepio and Artoo-Detoo become entangled in an illegal operation on the Hosk moon, and are forced to enter a droid battle arena.
